AD_ArrivedToCaveIn_FromPier.synopsis: The player has killed the eye, and sided with rebel duergar. Reinorcements arrive.

AD_ArrivedToCaveIn.synopsis: The player has failed to kill the eye, but sided with rebel duergar. Reinorcements arrive and shout an AD.

AD_ArrivedToCaveIn_FromPier_0.speaker: Morghal, Stone Guard Orgarth
AD_ArrivedToCaveIn_FromPier_0.text: Scrying eye's down? Time Nere got his due!

AD_ArrivedToCaveIn_0.speaker: Stonemason Gergerann, Stonemason Kith
AD_ArrivedToCaveIn_0.text: I'll do what I can - but that scrying eye's still peeping!
